name: OpenELEC RPi Config
tagline: Unofficial Raspberry Pi configuration add-on for OpenELEC
body:
![icon.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/18055122/repo/script.openelec.rpi.config/icon.png)

## Installation
=============================

1. Install my XBMC repository from [xbmc.repo.leopold.zip](http://bit.ly/1gorQQG).
1. Install **OpenELEC RPi Config** from **Leopold's Add-ons** under **Services**.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
